post.title: nvidia releases official geforce 178.24 whql drivers
post.content: nvidia has released new whql certified drivers to add support for the new nvidia geforce 9400/9300 chipsets as well as fix some bugs. http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp_178.24_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp64_178.24_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...8.24_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...8.24_whql.html update: looks like there's no installer exes up yet, try again in a few hours.
